body_html: Another slowness is that probably the perf of the checks that we do to make sure our kernels are valid (broadcasting groups, etc.) are super slow because they need to reallocate the vector of sizes for every single input. We should have a broadcasting function that can work on an array in-place, and that should significantly improve things.

body: Another slowness is that probably the perf of the checks that we do to make sure our kernels are valid (broadcasting groups, etc.) are super slow because they need to reallocate the vector of sizes for every single input. We should have a broadcasting function that can work on an array in-place, and that should significantly improve things.
